changeSet.author: bsutton
changeSet.sql: insert into `Group` (CONSISTENCYVERSION, name, street, city, state, postcode, Country ) select 1, name, street, city, state, postcode, "Australia" from Organisation O join Address A on O.Location_ID = A.ID where O.isourscoutgroup = 1
update Organisation set group_id = (select id from `Group`)

changeSet.author: bsutton
changeSet.sql: update Address join Organisation on Organisation.isourscoutgroup = 1 and Organisation.location_id = Address.id set Address.group_id = Organisation.group_id
